page.title: 19SHOPPING AROUND BYFIELD
page.content: THE SHOPS IN BYFIELD ARE USED MOSTLY WHEN PEOPLE HAVE FORGOTTEN SOMETHING IN TOWN.THE SHOP THAT IS LIKED MOST IN BYFIELD IS ALEY'S.THAT IS BECAUSE IT HAS KINDER SERVICE AND CHEAPER PRICES THAN THE CO-OP.WHEN PEOPLE GO SHOPPING TO THE TOWNS THEY USUALLY GO BY BUS OR BY CAR.WHEN PEOPLE GO SHOPPING IN THE VILLAGE THEY EITHER GO ON A BICYCLE OR WALK.THE TOWN SHOPS ARE POPULAR AS THEY HAVE MORE CHOICE AND BETTER PRICES. PEOPLE WHO SHOP IN TOWNS GO WEEKLY OR EVERY FORTNIGHT.THERE IS A LOCAL SHOP/ POST OFFICE WHICH IS USED MAINLY FOR DAY-TO-DAY REQUIREMENTS.PEOPLE FROM BODDINGTON MOSTLY SHOP IN LEAMINGTON SPA,DAVENTRY OR BANBURY,SOMETIMES VISITING THE LOCAL SHOPS IN BYFIELD OR WOODFORD HALSE.MOBILE SHOPS COME AROUND THE VILLAGES SELLING GROCERIES,WET FISH, BREAD AND MEAT.A FISH AND CHIP VAN CALLS AS WELL.
